title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 341.1 - Limitation of podiatry treatment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 341.1 - Limitation of podiatry treatment

State Regulations
A podiatrist who is authorized to treat workers'
compensation claimants shall be limited, pursuant to law, to the treatment of
injuries that affect only the foot and shall render such treatment only within
the field of his or her professional competence as recognized by his or her
authorized rating. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
341.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
